text: Hi all!
I have a problem with my form in HubSpot . Can help me someone ?

Hi - Does anyone on here use Cookiebot to manage their HubSpot tracking pixel?
I’m looking for some examples of how to approach this for HubSpot hosted sites and externally hosted sites to ensure I am fully GDPR and CCPA compliant.

Unless I’m mistaken HubSpot hosted content is not compliant with regulations as the tracking pixel fires and creates cookies by default.

Hiya all.  I’m a software developer and I’m quite new to HubSpot.  I’m looking for general guidance on the best way to produce some custom reports with graphics that require more complex queries.  I’m currently looking at building an app/module that I can add in and do the reports, including fancy graphs and an export to pdf feature.  Does anyone have any advice or maybe something I can use to start from?

Hi

I'm using HS smart blog import tool but it is not recognising the date (see below), it pulls it in as 20th Oct 2020. Any ideas why this is happening? is it something to do with the date format? Does the date need to be in a specific format?

So the vast majority of our builds are on the HubSpot CMS these days (woo hoo) but we still do WordPress sites here and there. What are you guys using to build WordPress sites these days? Elementor? Divi? Custom PHP? Some other developer-friendly theme that is lesser known?
I normally use Elementor, but i had worked with Visual Composer too.
Have worked*
Thanks for the note. Elementor seems to be most people's pick lately.
Because it's free and have a lot of addons

Speaking of WP and HubSpot CMS <@U24GZQ3GF>.....

If anyone's interested, myself and <@UAJ6ANLMU> from SmartBug will be having a lively debate on the topic later today: <https://www.smartbugmedia.com/HubSpot-cms-vs-wordpress>

We'll be discussing the pros and cons of each CMS from a marketers perspective, and will be covering issues of security, performance, scalability, expandability and more for each platform.

This webinar will be from the perspective of marketers and business leaders as opposed to developers, but we will be fielding audience questions as well.

We'll be going live at 3PM ET / 12PM PT, and all registrants will also receive a recording for those who can't attend live. Hope to see some community members in the audience!
I like Gutenberg or Elementor!
